308a5: khyim thab la ni 'gro bar byed// kun du sems 'thun bde dang ldan// 'thab dang rtsod pa med par gnas// me tog 'bras bu mang po dang // 'bri shing shing thog yod pa'i tshal// sor bzhi'i dbang tsam rtswa rnams rigs/ shi
308a6: bal lta bur reg bya 'jam/ / bsil drod shin du snyoms pa ste/ char dang rlung yang shin du snyoms// de tshe dbyar dgun ston yang snyoms// mtsho dang 'bab chu rlabs med cing // sa kun dang de ru ni// gseg ma bye ma dkar po
308a7: ya/ sran sa dang ni sran dkar tsam// mu tig lta bra mang pas mdzes// legs par brgyan pa'i tshal bzhin du// kun nas yang po 'byung ba man// khyong dang zong rdal 'dab 'brel ba/ de der te zhing shin te/ skrag
308a8: tshul dang 'od ma'i tshal/ / kun du khyim bya mang po rgya// nor mang byug cing 'jigs pa med// kun du khrims papang gnod mad ldan// nyin mtshan 'dod yon rdzams ce// gcig tu bde bar gnas pa yin// gar mi 'ad

308b1: mda' ltar 'gro/ / yid rab dang zhing bde dgas gnas// bza' dang btung ba bzang zhing mang // sha dang chang sogs sa co ldan// byang gi sgra me snyan dang ni// lha yi grong khyer lcang lo can// yangs pa can gyi grong khyer bzhin// 'dzam gling ldan
308b2: nas bzang por 'gyur/ / de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di grangs med pa'i bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig dang bcu drug tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rdzogs nas thams
308b3: cad bsgrol ba'i tshul gyis bam nyid du sbyin pa chen po ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs thams cad mthar byin cing 'di nas dga' ldan du mngon par skyes te/ de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu'i lha thams
308b4: cad 'ongs te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra dbyangs snyan pa chen po 'byin cing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gsol zhes skul bar byed do/ / de nas gzigs pa rnam pa lnga la mngon par gzigs
308b5: te/ / dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'khor nas 'ongs te rgyal po dung gi grong khyer rgyal mtshan blo gros su bram ze mdun na 'don tshangs rab ces bya ba'i btsun mo tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba'i lhums su 'jug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
308b6: stong phrag bcu 'dar zhing g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ / der zla ba bcu song nas drang srong ldang ba'i ri dgas rgyu ba'i gnas su yum las 'khrungs te/ rim gyis nang son nas rang gi bsod nams kyi mthu las sa 'og nas nor bu rin po
308b7: bdun las grub pa'i khang bzangs bzhi byung ba'i nang du rang nyid lha bzhin du lha mo zla ba'i gdong can dang / gzhan yang lha mo lta bu'i bud med mang po dang lhan cig tu mo stong phrag gcig tu lha'i longs spyod lta dul
308b8: med bang spyad do/ / de nas tha ma'i zhag la btsun pa'i gzugs zhig mthong nas gser gyi khang bur seng ge'i rgyal po ma dga' ba bzhin du rin po che'i khang bzangs dpal mang ba yod pa la me ga' zhing nges par ltung

309a1: pa chen po'i sems byung ste/ 'jig rten 'khor lo stong phrag bcu thams cad kyi lha rnams lha'i me tog lag tu khyer nas 'jig rten gyi 'khor lo 'dir 'ongs te 'khod par byed do// rgyal po dung dang bcwa
309a2: pa'i mi mang po yang me tog dang dri dang spos khyer te khang bzangs la bskor nas 'khod par byed do/ / nam mkha'i lha rnams kyang lha'i me tog lag tu khyer nas legs so legs so// zhes 'og min gyi bar du sgra
309a3: cher sgrogs cing 'khod par byed do/ / de nas rin po che'i khang bzangs rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor zhing nam mkha' la song nas bcwa lnga'i bzla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du byang
309a4: chub sems dpa' ni zla ba'i gdong can ma dang / / gzhan btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed de// sems dpa' chen po de dang thabs gcig tu 'gro ba'i sems yod pa thams cad kyang nam mkha'
309a5: la 'gro bar byed do/ / de nas tshangs pa chen pos ni dpag tshad gsum tsam yod pa'i gdugs dkar por 'dzin cing lnga'i dbang po'i rgyal po sadung bud par byed do// 'di ltar bsod nams kyi dpal chen po'i lha
309a6: dang mas bskor ba'i khang bzangs dang bcas pas byang chub kyi shing gi drung du nye bar 'ongs te/ de ji ltar zhe na/ shing sdong khru brgya nyi shu ste// yal ga'ang khru brgya nyi shu'i sring // rlung gis ngal bur bskyod pa na/
309a7: mthu'i gar gyi gdugs ltar snang // dus kun lha yi me tog ni// shin du legs par rgyas pa yang // 'khor lo tsam gyi steb la// gsar dri bzang bre gang tsam// rlung gis phyogs bcur bskyong ba na// da
309a8: tshad btsunan dri yis bya ba/ / me tog sa la bab pa yang // byang chub shing drung nyid du gnas de'i dus su nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bya'i rigs mang po skad snyan pos mchod pa byed cing 'gro bar byed do// de ltar nabya

309b1: chub kyi shing klu shing gi nye 'khor du 'ongs te nam mkha' las babs nas khangs bzangs sa'i nye 'khor yid du 'thad pa'i steng de nyid du 'khod par byed do/ / der dpal gyi khang bzangs kyi nang du zhag bdun du dka' thub byed/
309b2: do// de nas tshangs pa chen pos phul ba mkho ba'i yo byad blangs te rab tu byung bar byed do// 'khor thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ brgyad khri bzhi stong grangs snyed kyi// bram ze rig byed dang mkhas pa
309b3: de yi rjes su rab tu 'byung / / 'khor rnams kun kyang rab tu 'byung // de ltar rab tu byung nas lha mo zla ba'i gdong can mas phul ba'i 'o thug ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa gsol bar byed do// de'i dgongs thun la byang chub kyi shing
309b4: drung du nye bar 'ongs te rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang su khri bshams pa la shar gyi 'jig rten la mngon par gzigs te bzhugs par mdzad do/ / de nas rim gyis nyi ma'i skya reng shar ba'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
309b5: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon du mdzad de 'di skad gsung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'khor ba'i skye ba mang por ni// dug med pa'i don gyi phyir// gnas bzang kun du btsal byas kyang // yang yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal byung // da ni gnas
309b6: bzang mchog thob pas/ / da gzod gnas gzhan mi 'gro ste// dug khyim sdug bsngal thams cad bcas// rab bcom thobs pa shig pa yin// nyon mongs drug bcas 'dod pa yi// yid ni rnam par dag par byas//
309b7: 'di skad ces gsung nas byang chub kyi shing la nye bar gnas te zhag bdun phrag bdun song ba dang / tshangs pas gsol ba 'debs pa gsan nas drang srong lhung ba'i gnas su byon te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la
309b8: gshegs pa'i tshe/ zhabs ni bskyod mi spyod pa yang shing du rgyas pa'i pad steng gshegs// 'dab mar khru ni sum bcur bcas// bar gyi 'dab ma nyi shu lnga// gaM sar nyi shu'i khru dang ldan// ze 'brus la ni bcu drug ste// ge

310a1: sar kha dog shin du dmar/ / me tog pad mo chen po 'byung // stobs bcu mnga' ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar zhing gsal te nyi ma'i 'od kyang mi gsal zhing nyin mtshan bye brag med par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe snga dro dang
310a2: dgongs mo'i bya'i sgras shes par byed pa dang / me tog rgyas pas kyang 'jig rten pa rnams go bar byed do// gang dang gang na tshes 'chad pa yod pa de dang der chos kyi sgra thams cad la rab tu grags shing 'chad par byed do//
310a3: de'i tshe bram ze brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / tshangs pas ya phrag bco brgyad kyis thog mar chos kyi bdud rtsi'i thungs te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang byin rlabs brgya phrag mang po dang ldan pa 'od zer kha dog sna
310a4: tshogs pa 'gyed cing / brgya phrag mang po'i mtshan can mtshan bzang po sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang depe byad brgyad bcu mnyam par ldan zhing ngo mtshar mang po mda' ba/ brgya phrag mang po'i 'od de'i sku las 'byung ba yin no// ji ltar zhe/
310a5: na/ sngon po dang / ser po'i kha dog dang / dmar po'i kha dog dang / dkar po'i kha dog dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / dngul gyi kha dog gsal zhing gsal ba'i 'od zer dang bcas pa 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi sku de las 'od 'phro ba ta la'i
310a6: shing lta bu phyogs thams cad du skor zhing phung po so sor bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la lan gsum bskor ba byas shing yang mar 'gro bar byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das de'i sku khru brgyad bcurtsa brgyad kyi srid dang ldan pa yin te/
310a7: zhabs kyi mthil nas pus mo'i bar la khwa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so// bus mo dang lci ba'i bang la b+ha nyi shu rtsa gnyis so// lte ba dang mgur gyi bar la khwa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so// mgur dang dbu'i bar la khwa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// dpya
310a8: gnyis kyi ba ral khru nyi shu lnga lnga'o/ / sgrog rus re re la'ang khru lnga lnga'o// snyan shal gnyis la khru bdun bdun no// spyan re re'i dkyus la khru lnga lnga'o// smin ma gnyis la'ang khru lnga lnga'o// smin phrag la'ang khru lnga'o// shangs kyi

310b1: dkyus la khru bdun no/ / mchu gnyis la khru bcu'o// ljags kyi skor la khru lnga'o// gtsug tor la kru lnga'o// zhal gyi sgor gser gyi me long lta bu la khwa nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// mgrin pa la 'khru lnga'o// phyag gnyis kyi dkyus la khru bzhi bcu rtsa
310b2: bani pazhi bcurtsa bzhi 'byung ba yin no/ / de lta bu'i sangs rgyas de ni dpe med pa'i dpal dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' med pa dang ldan zhing / 'jig rten 'khor lo stong phrag bcu pa thams cad kyi lha dang mi'i dbus bu
310b3: zhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo kor zhing ston par mdad pa yin no/ / de'i jisus ya 'bum zag gcig gi wa dang mi rnams 'dzin pa med par dang po nyid du chos kyi mchog gis rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur te/ rnam pa
310b4: grol ba ma thob pa rnams lha'i yul du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di ltar byams pa legs pa'i mchog chen po de gang gis mi mthong zhe na/ ma bsad pa dang / pha bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /
310b5: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa ste sdig pa'i las lnga byed pa dang / mchod rten bshig pa dang / byang chub kyi shing bcad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gsod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi 'tsho ba nyams par byed pa dang / ser sna che ba dang //
310b6: rtag chad du nges par lta ba'i mu stegs dang / 'phags pa rnams la smod pa dang / gcer bu ba'i rigs can rnams kyis mi mthong ba yin no// tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag gcig gi rgyan yod pa'i thams cad sgrol ba'i skyes
310b7: pas chen po stong phrag gsum bzhag gcig la 'chad cing nyan par byed pa'i mi dang / mar me stong phrag gcig 'bul ba dang / dri bzang po med na yang me tog stong phrag gcig tsam 'bral ba dang / ud pa la sngon po stong
310b8: phrag gcig tsam 'bul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel yod pa'i mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la mchod pa byed pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas byams pade chos 'chad pa'i dus su de'i drung du chos kyi mchog

311a1: gis rnam par grol 'thob pa dang / mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ma yin pa sems can sbyin pa gtor ba dang / sdom pa bsrung ba dang / lha khang byed pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gis bon skyed pa dang / ring bsrel gyi mchod
311a2: rten byed pa dang / byang chub kyi shing dang mchod rten la zhabs thog byed pa dang / sems can la phan la'i tshal byed pa dang / zam pa byed pa dang / lam 'chos pa dang / 'gron po'i gnas khangar byed pa dang / chu mig byed pa dang
311a3: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad par byed pa dang / sangs kyi chos 'di dag 'chang ba la dri dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byed pa dang / khril byi dor byed cing legs par chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur dam
311a4: pabyed pa dang / ma dad pa'i zhabs thog byed pa dang / rigs kyis che ba la gus pa 'byed pa dang / sdom pa srung ba'i dus su dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos bcwa lnga ma dus ston byed pa dang / lhung zed 'bu la ba
311a5: dang / sta ne ster bar byed pa thams cad kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong zhing ma jal ba yin no// de lta bu'i bsod nams mang po mi nus na yang me tog spar mo ra tsam dang / mar me gcig tsam
311a6: 'bul bar byed pa dang / gzhan gyi bsod nams la rjes su yid rang ba'i dge bar byed pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyis de'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong ba yin no// yang dag par rdzogs
311a7: pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa de mthong bar 'dod pa'i dad pa yod cing sbyin pa tong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bsnyen gnas sgrub pa dang / don yang dag par sgoms dang / dge ba'i las shin du legs par byed pa
311a8: rnams kyis shin du legs par mthong ba yin no/ / thub pa'i gsung rab thos gyur nas// tshangs par spyod par grub byed pa// de rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol phyin// 'chi med thar pa thob par 'gyur// tshangs spyod

311b1: yang dag srub byed cing / / sbyin gnas mchog la sbyin byed dang / bsnyen gnas bslab pa lcogs srung dang // byams pa'i skom la legs gnas pa// rtsegacig pa yis bsgrub par gyis// nyen mtshan bsod nams rab grub gyis//
311b2: 'di ru dag pa srub byed na// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang bcas pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
311b3: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa byams pa'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // thub dbang mchog dang rgyal ba byams pa yi// bstan pa gsal byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di// yon tan dang ldan si dag gling yul
311b4: gyi/ stong phrag mang po'i dge 'du kun cig so// ma rem mdzad slob rdo rje gdan bzhugs pa// paN chen A nan da shI yon tan can// dge slong chos kyi spyan can skad gnyis mkhas// bstan la phan 'dod bzang po nyid da//
311b5: de'i legs gtugs dge slong yud rigs 'dzin// skad gnyis smra ba mchog gi rjes 'jug pa// kun dga' rgyal mtshan thub bstan dpal bzang pos// ston pa 'das nas lo stong brgyad brgya dang // lnga bcu lhag pa'i zlab
311b6: bcu 'das dus/ / chos kyi rgyal po ha shar mnga' gsol tshe// me lug dgun zla ra ba'i yar do la// dpal ldan bla ma kun dga' se ge yi/ sku drin la brten dpal ldanas gyur ni// sgra don ji bzhin legs par bsgyur ba
311b7: yin/ / 'phags nor rgyan ldan skyes bu dam pa rnams// dam chos rin chen 'di la gtsug rgyan mdzod// nyon mongs nad can phrag dog rab rib can// chos sman 'di ste na nad med mig gsal 'gyur// dge ba'i diganas
311b8: ma lus legs bsdoms te/ / bla ma thub dbang byams pa mgon la sogs// sangs rgyas kun mnyes rnam dag rgya chen zhing // rnam dag rab bsgrubs bstan pa mchog bsgrubs nas// phyogs bcu'i zhing dul

312a1: snyed kyi sprul pa yis/ / sems can thams cad bstan la dang byas shing // sangs rgyas bstan pa rab tu rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas sku gsum ye shes sbyar thob shog/ shes bya mtha' yas rab tu zab byir
312a2: dges byed tshad can ba tu rtogs sgra'i phyir/ / 'khrul par gyur na rab tu sems dge ba'i phyir// skye ba mkhas rnams rab tu bzod mdzad rigs// rgyan po dang lags par btugs so// phyogs dus tham cad du bkra tra
312a3: dang bde legs kyis khyab par gyur cig/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma~M tra~M maT+Ta ka raN/ bdakad du/ 'phags pa byams pa lung bstan pa// 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi
312a4: dpon khyab bdag dpal/ / shes rab chen po shA ri'i bus// 'jig rten rnams la snying brtse'i phyir// ston pa la ni yongs zhus pa// sngon dang phyi mtha'i mdo las ni// ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas gang // 'jig rten
312a5: 'dren par mdzad pa po/ / byams pa zhes bya bstan pa de// 'dren pa bdag ni de'i mthu dang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni don thams cad// rgyas par rab tu nyan 'tshal na// de ni mi mchog bdag la gsungs// de la ston pas
312a6: bka' stsal pa/ / sangs rgyas byams pa mi mchog de'i// 'byor pa rgyas par khyod la ngas// lung bstan bya yis ngal nyon// de'i tshe na rgya mtshon// khor yug tu ni dpag tshad brgya// skam par 'gyur te de yang ni//
312a7: 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam bzang yin// de tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yang // chu zheng thag gru mnyam par ni// dpag tshad stong phrag bcu pa ste// 'byung po kun gyi gnas su 'gyur// de'i tshe na yul gyi mi// dar cing
312a8: 'byor la chad pa med/ / 'tshe med mi ni de dag kyang // dge ba byed pa dag tu 'gyur// sa gzhi tsher ma med pa dang // mnyam zhing ne'u bsing sngo dang ldan// 'phar zhing nems shes byed pa ste// shing ba la mdab ma

312b1: shin du'adam/ / mdar shang dran gom pa la// sa sram rmos par b+hag/ sna tshogs tshan gyis mdzes byas pa'o// gas kyi ldan shing 'thung bar 'gyur// ma tog las 'bras ldan pa'i// ldan
312b2: shing 'phang du rgyad grags 'byung / / de dag rnams kyi tshe lo ni// brgyad khri kho na thub par 'gyur// sems can de dag skyon med cing // nyes bral spro ba tshe dang ldan// lus chen kha dog ldan pa ste// chen po che yi stobs dang /
312b3: ldan// nad ni gsum zhig 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod dang mi za rga ba'o// bu mo lo ni lnga brgya dag/ lon nas khyol bag mar 'gro// de tshe tog ldan zhes bya ba'i// rgyal po'i pho brang 'byung 'gyur te// srog chags dge ba'i
312b4: las byed pa'i/ / sems can rnams kyi gnas yin no// chur ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis te// rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun yod pa'i// bsod nams byas pa rnam dag gi/ grong khyer yid 'ong 'byung bar 'gyur// rin chen bdun las byas
312b5: mtho ba'i/ / rab 'bang du rgyang grags 'byung // shing thags dang ni sgo khang rnams// rin chen sna tshogs dag gis brgyan// rin chen so phag gis brtsigs shing // pad ma u ta pa la gcal du bkram// du rabs mdzes
312b6: par byas pa yi/ / 'obs kyang 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur// khor yug tu ni ta la yi// phreng ba bdun gyis yongs su bskor// dril bu'i dra bas mdzes byas pa// rin chen bzhi rgyu'i tal dag/ rlung bskyod ta la de dag las// snyan
312b7: ba'i sgra ni 'di ltar dper/ / sil snyan yan lag lnga ldan bzhin// de las yid 'od sgra grag 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag grong khyer der// rtse dga' ba de don gnyer ba rnams// de dag ta la'i sgra de yis// rab tu mgu
312b8: zhing rtsen par byed/ / ud pal ku mu ngas gang ba'i// rdzing thu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// grong de bskyed mos 'tshal dang ni// nags tshal phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// der ni rung zhes bya ba yi// rgyal po ga

313a1: brjid che ldan zhing / / stobs che gling bzhi bang phyug pa// mnga' bdag 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung // dpung gi yan lag bzhi 'byor cing // rin chen bdun dang yang dag ldan// rgyal po 'di'i sras rnams ni// sto
313a2: du chad par 'byung bar 'gyur/ / mi yi dbang po de yang ni// sa 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas par// chad pa med cing chos dang ni// 'thun pas yongs su skyong bar 'gyur// de che dung zhes bya ba'i// sa bdag rgyal po de la ni//
313a3: rin chen khrag khrig brgyas mtshon pa'i// gter chen bzhi ni 'byung bar 'gyur// su'i mtshan na ser skya ste// bcom brlag na ni dkar po yin// sa 'dzin nini i'i yi mdag// bA rA na sde'i grong khyer dung / gter ni bzhi po
313a4: kho na dang / rgyal po yang dag ldan par ni// 'byung 'gyur dpa' bo chen po da// bsod nams brgya'i stobs las skyes// de tsha rgyal de'i mdun na 'don// bram ze tshangs rab ces bya ba// thos mang rig byed bzhi 'don pa'i//
313a5: mkhan po zhig ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 'don du 'jug dang gsang tshig 'dzin// dran ldan rig byed/ gzhung 'grel dang // sgra des sbyor bcas pha rol phyin// brda sprod pa dang tshig dang ldan// de tshe de yi chung ma ni// tshangs ldan
313a6: ma zhes bya ba ste/ / mdzes shing bstan sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang grags dang ldan pa 'byung // byams pa gang zag mchog gyur pa// dga' ldan gnas nas shi yos nas// deng tshe de'i lhums su ni// nges par nying mtshams
313a7: sbyor bar 'gyur/ / gzi brjid chen po zla ba bcu// tsha par lhums su zhugs nas kyang // byams pa'i sum ni bskyed mos tshal// me tog pacang rgyas nang gshegs nas// chos ston ma de mi 'dug ci// mnyer 'bring bzhin
313a8: ngag tu ni/ / gang gi yal ga la bzung nas// byams pa bltam pa nyid du 'gyur// ma yi mchog tu gyur pa de// glo ga pas nas ni 'byung 'gyur te// dper na sprin gyi phung po nas// nyi ma zung ba bzhin dugs la// ji ltar chu yi bdam

313b1: bzhin/ / mngal gyi 'dam gyis mi gos sa// khams gsum 'din thams cad du// 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs par 'gyur// de nas rtswa byin lnga dbang po// bde sogs mnga' bdag dga' 'gyur nas// byams pa rkang gnyis
313b2: mchog gyur ba/ / bltam pa'i tshan len par 'gyur// de ni bltam ma thag tu yang // gom pa bdun dga'ador bar 'gyur// gom pa re rer gter dang ni// pad ma re re 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhi dag tu gzigs nas ni/
313b3: bdag gi skye ba tham sa da// 'di yin yang srid yod ma yin// yang dang yang du phyir mi 'ong // zag med mya ngan 'das 'gro zhes// gsung yang rab tu bka' stsal to// klu rnams kyis ni chu yi rgyun// bsil dang 'jam pas sku bsil
313b4: 'gyur/ / nam mkha' ngos nas lha rdzas kyi// gos dang me tog 'bab par 'gyur// de'i dbu la gdugs kang po// lha rnams kyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur// mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis mnga' ba// byams pa dpal
313b5: gyis 'bar ba de/ / ma mas yang dag blangs nas su// yum gyi phyag tu 'bul bar 'gyur// rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i// khyogs ni yid du 'ong ba la// sras dang bcas par zhugs gsol nas// lha rnams kyis ni
313b6: khyer bar 'gyur/ / sal snyan stong phrag du ma dag/ sgra 'byin 'khrol ba'i grong khyer der// byams pa gshegs pa tsam gyis ni// me tog char ba 'bab par 'gyur// de'i nyin par sbrum pa yi// bud med rnams kyang btsa' bar 'gyur//
313b7: de dag thams cad nyams bde zhing // bde le gsuni bca' bar 'gyur// tshangs rab mtshan mchog sum bcus gnyis// ldan pa'i sras de mthong nas ni// gsang tshig dag la rab brtags nas// de'i 'og tu dga' bar 'gyur//
313b8: ji ltar gsang tshig las 'byung bzhin// gzhon nu'i 'gro ba gnyis yin te/ mi dbang 'khor los snang ba'am// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// byams pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// dpal de na tshed rdzogs nas

314a1: ni/ skye dgu 'di ni sdug bsngal snyams// chos kyi bdag nyid dgongs par mdzad// dbyangs tshe tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan// 'od che gser gyi mdog dang ldan// sto dpal che zhing thal gong rgyas// pad ma'i mdapa
314a2: ma 'dra ba'i spyan/ / de'i sku'i khru du ni// khru ni brgyad cu dag tu 'gyur// zhang ni khru rnams nyi shu ste// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor de yi phyed// byams pa de ni bram ze'i bu// stong phrag bzhi po dag dang ni// brgyad bcus mdun du
314a3: 'dar nas ni/ / gsang tshig dag kyang 'don du 'jug/ de nas rgyal po chen po rung // sboms su 'dom ni drug cu bzhi// 'phang du 'dom ni stong yod pa'i// mchod sdong zhig ni 'jug par 'gyur// mi dbang de yis mchod sdong de//
314a4: rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas// mchod sbyin gyis ni mdun drangs te// bram ze dag la rab tu 'bul// mchod sdong yid 'ong rin chen rgyu// de ni phul ma thag tu yang // bram ze stong po rnams kyis ni// de'i mod la bged par gyur
314a5: byams pas mchod sdong de yi ni/ / mi rtag nyid du mthong nas kyang // 'khor ba mtha' dag rnams bsams te// rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur// 'dir bdag rab tu byung nas ni// bdud rtsi'i go 'phang reg 'gyur dang /
314a6: skye bo 'chi bdag nad rga ba'i// 'jigs las 'grol bar 'gyur snyam zhes// skye bo rab dang gzigs nas ni// sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang // sdug bsngal yang dag 'ong ba dang // bde ba mya ngan las 'das 'gro// 'phags
314a7: lam yan lag brgyad pa yi/ / bden pa dag kyang ston par 'gyur// de'i chos dathos nas kyang // bstan pa la ni nan tan sgrub// byams pa gang zag mchog gyur te// stong phrag pa ni po dag dang ni// brgyad bcu dag gis mdun 'dang na/
314a8: rab tu 'byung bar ngas 'byung 'gyur// de tshad mi byang chub shing // klu shing zhes bya 'byung 'gyur te// da'i yal ga gnam 'phang du// dpag tshad tsam du yang dag 'phags// de ni byang chub shing de'i// yal ga gil pa u0f7f/

314b1: cad du/ kho ra khor yug rgyad grags drug/ khebs pa kho na dag tu 'gyur// byams pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur de// de'i drung du gshegs nas su// bla med byang chub zhi ba ni// 'thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// gang gi chu/
314b2: mo kho na la// rab tu 'byung bar mngon 'byung ba// de ni nub mo kho na la// byang chub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur// de yi 'og tu thub mchog de// dam tshes sdug bsngal kun spong zhing // zhi ba yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i// gsu
314b3: gis son par mdzad par 'gyur/ / me tog mdzes pa nus pa yi// bskyed mos tshal du de'i 'khor// dpag chad brgya khyon gang bdag/ yang dag 'du ba kho nar 'gyur// de nas mi dbang rgyal po rung // grags pa chen pos /
314b4: nas ni// sbyin pa grangs med byas nas kyang // rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur// rgyal po stong phrag bzhi dang ni// brgyad bcu dag gis mdun pa dar te// khyim nas ngas par byung nas ni// rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur byam
314b5: pa'i lab kyang de bzhin du/ / de'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i// bram ze rnams kyis mdun bdang nas// rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas de tshe khyim bdag ni// nor bzang tshogs ni rnam grags pa// chos kyi bdag nyid stong
314b6: ngag gis/ / bsod nams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// du dag bud med rin po che// sa gzhes ni rnam grags pa// bud med stong phrag bzhi dang ni// brgyad bcu dag gis mdun mdar te// de yi 'og tu mngon byung nas// ra5/
314b7: 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi tshen byams pa yi// bstan pa la ni srog chags dag/ stong phrag dang ni brgya phrag rnams// rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de'i 'og tu thugs je can// son pa byams pa rkang gnyis mchog
314b8: 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas mi/ / shAkya seng ge thub pa ste// gtso bo skyob par mdzad pa po// dam pa'i chos dbyings gzigs gyur pa// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di dag kun// thar pa'i lam de bskyed nas kyang // don gyis

315a1: nga yi bstan la btang / / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis// shAkya thub la mchod nas ni// da yi bstan la lhags pa yin// gur gum chu yis gdab pa dang // tsan dan gyi ni byug/
315a2: pa yis// shAkya thub pa'i mchod rten la// mchod nas nga yi bstan la lhags// de tshe sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun la yang skyabs song shing // dge ba'i las kyang byas nas ni// de yi bstan la lhags pa yin// shAkya ser
315a3: ge'i bstan pa la/ / bslab gzhi yang dag blangs nas su// ji ltar gsung bzhin bsgrubs nas ni// nga'i bstan la lhags pa yin// dge 'dun la yang chos gos dang // zhal zas dang ni btung ba dang // snyun gses sna tshogs sbyin
315a4: pa rnams/ / phul nas nga yi bstan la lhags// bcu bzhi dang ni bcwa lnga dang // de bzhin zla gcig tshes brgyad dang // chos 'phrul wa yi zla ba la// yan lag brgyad legs mnyam bzhag cing // bsnyen gnas gso sbyong byas nas
315a5: ni/ / nga yi bstan la lhags so zhes// don 'di rab tu gsung bar 'gyur// de yi nyan thos rnams kyang ni// cho 'phrul gsum gyis 'dul bar 'gyur// de tshe de dag thams cad ni// zag zad 'grogs na bde bar 'gyur// de'i
315a6: 'dras pa dang po ni/ / nyan thos srid pa bcad gyur pa// dung phyung phrag dgu bye phrag drug/ tshad pa'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur// de'i 'dus pa gnyis pa ni// nyon mongs 'ching ba las grol ba'i// dung phyur phrag dgu bye phrag bzhi/
315a7: tshangs pa'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi 'dus pa gsum pa ni// sems zhi rnam par grol gyur pa// dung phyur phrag dgu bye phrag gnyis// tshangs pa'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// lha dang
315a8: mi rnams rnam btul te/ / nyan thos dge 'dun thabs gcig tu// grong du bsod snyoms spyod la rgyu// da nas rtog ldan dga' lha yi// grong khyer der ni gshegs pa na// grong khyer mchog tu man d+ha ra'i// me tog char chen 'bab par

315b1: 'gyur/ / thub pa grod der gshegs pa la// lha yis me tog 'thor bar 'gyur// rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang // brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum dbang // tshangs pa lha tshogs thabs gcig tu// de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur//
315b2: lha'i bu ni mthu chen gyis// ud pa la pad ma ku ma ta// pad ma dkar po dri zhem dang // a ka ru dang tsan dan dang // de bzhin lha rdzas phreng ba dang // lha rdzas gos kyang 'thong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon de grong khyer gyi// mchog tu gshes
315b3: ba mthong nas ni/ / shing bal mdab ltar 'dam pa yi/ sa der gding ba rgya cher 'dings// de dag la ma kad phreng ba ni// sna tshogs mdzes pa rnam par 'grems// lha'i bu ni mthu chen dang // mi rnams yid na rib dang ba// gdugs dang rgyas
315b4: mtshan ba dan dang / / spos dang phreng ba byug pa dang // rol mo sgra snyan bsgrags pa yis// ston pa la ni mchod par 'gyur// brgya byin mig stong lha rnams kyi// rgyal po bde sogs bdag po de// rab mgu thal mo sbyar nas ni// 'jig
315b5: rten mgon la bstod par byed/ / skyes bu bcad shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zag mchog gyur bcom ldan 'das// skye dgu la ni thugs brtser mdzod// de'i tshen lha'i bu// mthu chen dung /
315b6: ces bya ba 'byung // de yang thal mo rab byung nas// 'jig rten mgon la bstod par byed// tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor cing // tshangs pas kyang ni mdun pa dang te// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni sgrog bzhin du// dam pa'i chos ni
315b7: gsung bar 'gyur/ / zag zad nyes pa rnams bral zhing // srid pa'i 'ching ba rab spangs pa'i// dgra bcom rnams kyis sa 'di ni// thams cad kun du gad bar 'gyur// lha dang mi dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin dang ni srin po klu/ mthu chen/
315b8: rnams ni mgu gyur nas/ ston la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// gang dag byams pa'i bstan pa la tshangs par spyad pa spyod gyur pa// de dag gdon maze bar ni// nyon mongs med cing the tsom med// gang dag byams pa'i bstan pa la// ra ba

316a1: spyad pa spyod 'gyur ba/ / de dag gdon mi za bar ni// de yi med cing yongs 'dzin med// gser dang dngul la 'dzin med cing // gnas med chags pa'ang yod pa yin// gang dag byams pa'i bstan pa la// tshangs par spyad pa
316a2: spyod 'gyur ba/ / de dag gdod mi za bar ni// sred pa'i dra ba gcad pa dang // bsam gtan rdzogs par byas nas ni// dga' dang bde dang yang dag ldan// 'byung po kun la thugs rtse ba// byams pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ lo ni drug khri dag
316a3: tu yang / dam pa'i chos ni ston par 'gyur// de na srog chags brgya stong dang // 'bum 'phrag rnam par 'dren pa ste// dam pa'i chos la btul nas ni// de nas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// thub pa chen pos gsungs pa de// yongasu
316a4: mya ngan 'das nas kyang / / de tshe de'i dam chos ni// lo khri dag tu gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba shAkya thub de la// sems ni rab du dad par gyis// des na byams pa rkang gnyis mchog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas
316a5: chas dag dang / / dge 'dun tshogs kyi mchog la ni// sems ni rab tu dad gyi sa dang // don chen rab du 'grub par 'gyur// thugs rje che ldan de lta bu'i// byams pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// de tshe gnyis par byas nas ni// de nas mya ngan 'da' bar
316a6: 'gyur/ ya mtshan 'di dag thos gyur cing // 'byor pa mi nyung mthong mdzad de// nag po'i rigs kyang dang 'gyur na// mkhas pa su zhig dang mi 'gyur// de phyir 'di na bdag nyid che// 'dod cing bdag la legs 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bstan pa can bzhin
316a7: grangs pa'i rgyas la lus par / lags pa byangs pa sung brtan rtog s+ho// rgyag gyis khan po dzin med dag po nub pan d+ha dpal bags N+Di tas bsgyur/ e d+ha ma d+ham/ zlag pa da// tsu man pa / sa pacwa drim tham na/
